name: test_e2e_with_logs[305_CMD_ENV_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_001` |
| **Name** | Environment variable in PATH |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `PATH=/tmp:$PATH whoami`
- **Encoded**: `PATH%3D%2Ftmp%3A%24PATH%20whoami`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~39000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:29:05.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_ENV_001-1769912945578-s5k1ha pattern_id=CMD_ENV_001 uri=/?q=PATH%3D%2Ftmp%3A%24PATH%20whoami client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
